page.title: 03Marlingford
page.content:
Marlingford is a small village in the suburbs of Norwich,{population of {about 300}.There is a telephone box, a village hall, a cricket pitch, a post box, a pub, a church, and a mill through which the river{Wensum}flows. There used to be a post office but it was closed a few years ago because it was robbed many times.
The children who live in Marlingford have a choice as to which school they are to go to. Easton, Bawburgh and Barford offer{infant and junior schools, but senior pupils have a choice of Costessey High or any other nearby High school.
